title: What Happened to Anna?
description: Some try to protect those they love…even after death.Upon moving into a restored turn-of-the-century house, Andrea and John discover they aren’t the only occupants. Not only is their new home haunted by the ghost of a woman, but a demon from another dimension who wants to seduce the new female owner.After Andrea finds a photo of Anna—their resident ghost—she begins to relive Anna’s life through dreams and waking visions, falling prey to the handsome demon lover who, it seems, will do anything and everything to stop her from answering one burning question:What happened to Anna?Content warning: seductively handsome demons, hauntingly beautiful ghosts, and just the right amount of scares.
author: Jennifer Robins
